project_descr: The project will support recovery, reduce vulnerability and increase resilience in flood affected municipalities through area-based, multi-dimensional and integrated approaches. integrated approaches in 27 municipalities;

outputs.output_descr: Contribute to the recovery actions through provision of direct assistance to municipalities affected by floods.
